p.s: In the following, Chris is being analyzed by how he is presented and which stylistic devices are being used to present his relationship with his girlfriend Starr.
In the first shot Chris walks down the hallway in slow motion and greeting all his friends.
The slow motion is being used to watch Chris' apperianceappearance and behaviour.
In this way, he is being watched by the audience through Starr's eyes, because she watches him with dreamy eyes.
In the voiceover Starr is talking about Chris using nice words and describing him in a soft and dreamy voice.
Because of the camera moving backwards it seems like Chris is coming towards the camera or the audience.
The director also presents him in a medium close up, because it is the first the audience gets to see Chris and like this they can make themselves a quick, but effective, impression of Chris.
Besides the voiceover of Starr, soft and calm music plays in the background, which matches Starr's raving about Chris.
While Chris puts his headphones on Starr's head, the audience might think that Chris knows what Starr likes and that he treats her well.
But when they both start talking about their conflict, the audience experiences the truth.
Their conversation is presented in a close up, which makes it easier to understand or watch emotions, facial expressions and gestures.
The camera switches during the conversation to the one whoswho's talking, which again makes it easier to watch their emotions.
For example, while Chris talks the camera switches to his face and the audience can see that he takes this conversation serious.
During that, the camera switches only for a few seconds to Starr and the audience can see her face.
Because Starr looking away in that moment, it seems like she's not interested in Chris trying to say sorry.
Chris also tries to fix what he has done by playing the beat for Starr and dancing to it in the hallway in front of the other students.
His dancing is presented in a medium close up to show his movements.
He practically succeeded, because it makes Starr laugh and chuckle about it.
This also shows that Chris really put effort in his acting to make Starr happy.
In conclusion, Starr and Chris have a healthy relationship, although the argue some time.
Chris tries his best to fix all the problems he made to make his girlfriend feel better.
